metadata.title: CVE-2021-47473 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  scsi: qla2xxx: Fix a memory leak in an error path of qla2x00_process_els()  Commit 8c0eb596baa5 ("[SCSI] qla2xxx: Fix a memory leak in an error path of qla2x00_process_els()"), intended to change:          bsg_job->request->msgcode == FC_BSG_HST_ELS_NOLOGIN           bsg_job->request->msgcode != FC_BSG_RPT_ELS  but changed it to:          bsg_job->request->msgcode == FC_BSG_RPT_ELS  instead.  Change the == to a != to avoid leaking the fcport structure or freeing unallocated memory.
